column_1.title: What is the US2 Vault？
column_1.content: The US2 Vault is a US2 yield aggregator. Depositing US2 means participating in our Launchpool, Savings, Defi staking and other projects while gaining rewards.

column_2.title: What are the sources of US2 Vault's rewards?
column_2.content: The rewards from US2 Vault are accumulated by the income of different projects. Currently this includes Savings, Launchpool, and Defi staking.

column_3.title: When can I redeem after subscribing to the US2 Vault?
column_3.content: Subscription and Redemption are available from 00:10-23:50(UTC) every day.

column_4.title: What is the difference between subscribing to the US2 vault and participating in Launchpool projects？
column_4.content: If there is only one project in the Launchpool, the APY is the same for these two products; if there is more than one project on-going in the Launchpool, the US2 vault will subscribe to the projects evenly, whereas Launchpool users can choose which project to participate in and allocate their funds as they want.

column_5.title: When will the US2 Vault start calculating rewards?
column_5.content: The US2 Vault is equivalent to participating in multiple projects at the same time, and the calculations for income and interests are done separately according to different product rules.

column_6.title: When will the US2 Vault start distributing profits?
column_6.content: After depositing US2, users' rewards will be distributed the next day.

column_7.title: When will the Savings product start calculating earnings?
column_7.content: After transferring assets into Savings, users will receive Savings interests and the earnings will be calculated on the second day.

column_8.title: When will the Launchpool start calculating rewards？
column_8.content: Piex will take an hourly snapshot of users' holdings in the Launchpool and calculate mining rewards; The annualized income and total Launchpool data of each pool will be updated in real time; US2 transferred to the Launchpool will still enjoy US2's standard equity holding statistics, such as airdrops, Launchpad holding statistics, VIP rights, etc.
